summary: Fixed the Enter button functionality in the PIN authentication system. Changed from onKeyPress to onKeyDown with preventDefault() to ensure both button clicks and keyboard Enter key work properly. The server is now running on port 3001 instead of 3000.
current_status: PIN authentication system fully functional with both click and keyboard support. App accessible at localhost:3001 with working Skip Authentication feature using PIN code 3103. All authentication methods now work reliably.
